${ModID}:SurgingDefend.NAME: Surging Defend
${ModID}:SurgingDefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength until the end of the turn. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Growing Pain.

${ModID}:Germinate.NAME: Germinate
${ModID}:Germinate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Boom *and *Bust into your draw pile.
${ModID}:Germinate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a *Boom *and *Bust+ into your draw pile.

${ModID}:DispersalStrike.NAME: Dispersal Strike
${ModID}:DispersalStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity until the end of the turn. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Growing Pain. NL Channel 1 ${ModID}:Seed.

${ModID}:MarginalGain.NAME: Marginal Gain
${ModID}:MarginalGain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce debuffs by 1. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Growing Pain.

${ModID}:Engulf.NAME: Engulf
${ModID}:Engulf.DESCRIPTION: The first time you would gain a debuff each turn, gain one fewer but gain 2 ${ModID}:Growing Pain instead.

${ModID}:ExplosiveBurst.NAME: Explosive Burst
${ModID}:ExplosiveBurst.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Growing Pain. NL Deal damage equal to your ${ModID}:Growing Pain, !${ModID}:m2! times.

${ModID}:RecklessEscalation.NAME: Reckless Escalation
${ModID}:RecklessEscalation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Strength and 1 ${ModID}:Growing Pain.
${ModID}:RecklessEscalation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you play an Attack, gain 1 temporary Strength and 1 ${ModID}:Growing Pain.

${ModID}:BoomAndBust.NAME: Boom and Bust
${ModID}:BoomAndBust.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, draw !M! card. NL At the end of your turn, gain 5 ${ModID}:Growing Pain.
${ModID}:BoomAndBust.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, draw !M! cards. NL At the end of your turn, gain 5 ${ModID}:Growing Pain.

${ModID}:EndlessFlexibility.NAME: Endless Flexibility
${ModID}:EndlessFlexibility.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, add a *New *Growth to hand.

${ModID}:NewGrowth.NAME: New Growth
${ModID}:NewGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to your ${ModID}:Growing Pain. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:NewGrowth.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to twice your ${ModID}:Growing Pain. NL Ethereal. NL Exhaust.
